info.title: odmObject foaming

foaming.description:
This odmObject describes the attributes associated with foaming. The Property "foamstrength" of the liquid is represented as an integer.
The foam strength is an integer, the range of which may be enforced by the presence of the Property "range".
foaming.name: foaming

foamstrength.description: The desired foaminess of the liquid.
foamstrength.name: foamstrength

range.description: applies to the allowed values of speed
range.name: range
